mcq.statement: Choose the grammatically correct sentence:   A) He’s one of the tallest boy of the class.   B) He’s one of tallest boys of the class.   C) He’s one of the tallest boys in the class.   D) He’s tallest boy of the class.

options.a: He’s one of the tallest boy of the class.
options.b: He’s one of tallest boys of the class.
options.c: He’s one of the tallest boys in the class.
options.d: He’s tallest boy of the class
